oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Pension declaration for deceased soldier
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pension declaration of a dependent (mother) of a Union soldier who died of disease in Nashville, July 1865. The soldier was Pvt. John T. Elrod, 1st Tenn. Mtd. Inf. Regt., USA. Declaration is written in a Putnam Co. (Tenn.) School Attendance Record Book.; Elrod enlisted in October 1864 in Carthage (Tenn." He died in Cumberland Hospital, Nashville (Tenn.) July 27, 1865, and was buried in the City Cemetery. The soldier's mother was Mary E. Elrod, age 67. She believed his death was due to army service.
